Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph:

| --- |
| chloroform |
| chlorobenzene |
| toluene |
| THF |

I removed "1,2-dichlorobenzene (DCB)" and "1,2,4-trichlorobenzene (TCB)" from the list as they are not clearly referred to as "Material names" in the paragraph. They are mentioned as specific compounds, but not as material names.
